group_1.textLeft: So, the case of the Impersonator Magical Girl@has been solved! Case closed!

group_1.textRight: I'm really glad I was able to help, even if@it was only a bit.
Well, the likes of this are nothing to one@such as I!

group_1.textLeft: Okay, the Investigation Squad is@hereby disbanded!

group_1.textRight: So casually!
(I see. Now I have no reason to associate@with everyone...)

group_1.textLeft: Wait, but before we break up!@I just thought of something
I think Saechi's, like, super brainy.
So! Will you help out with the counseling room?

group_1.textRight: Help out...?

group_1.textLeft: Like, you know, sometimes there are problems@I don't get.
But! If you're here, then... Whoa!

group_1.textRight: Whoa...?

group_1.textLeft: You could solve 'em in a snap!@How about that?

group_1.textRight: (I have a part-time job, so I don't have@that much free time, but...)
(If I stay here, I might have the chance to@expand my network...)
As long as you don't pull any pranks...@I might come here once in a while.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yaaay! No pranks, ever!

group_1.textRight: If you do, then I'll come to you every@once in a while!
I'll come to you, too, if I must.

group_1.textLeft: Everyone's always welcome!

group_1.textRight: Won't the counseling room be packed...?
Hello...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, welcome! What's troubling you?

group_1.textRight: ...I'm already in the fifth grade, but I'm not@getting any closer to being a grown-up...

group_1.textLeft: I see, I see... I get it...
What do you think, Saechi?
Compared to my younger siblings, I think@you're already quite mature.
Even though I told them that it was@supposed to be a surprise,
they immediately revealed our dad's@birthday present to him.
They're so childish...

group_1.textRight: You must be close, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Yes... *Giggle*
...Ah, Himika, could you prepare some snacks?
What do you think, Ria?

group_1.textRight: How about changing your hairstyle?
The current trend is to let the hair hang down...

group_1.textLeft: As expected from a model...!
Then, would you like to try styling your hair@a little?

group_1.textCenter: Do you think a low ponytail would look@more mature?
No, but if the goal is to look more mature...
Ah, um, both of them!@Both of them, please!

group_1.textLeft: Saechi's face looks a less tense.

group_1.textRight: I know what you mean.

group_1.textLeft: Maybe I should show her how squishy@her face is in a mirror.

group_1.textRight: That'll probably make her mad at you.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, aren't there a lot of peeps here today?

group_1.textRight: You're right...

group_1.textLeft: Hold up, there's a super pretty lady here!
I'm gonna go invite her to a mixer!

group_1.textRight: Huh... On your first meeting...?

group_1.textLeft: I'm not going, but I've been asked to@help set it up!

group_1.textCenter: Whoaaa... The counseling room is@completely overbooked...

group_1.textRight: Nice to meetcha!
Sorry to spring this on you, but would you@like to come to a mixer?
We're in the middle of setting it up, but@we don't have enough people...!
You're from the same school as Miko-senpai,@right? Minaminagi Liberty Academy?

group_1.textLeft: Um, ah...yes...

group_1.textRight: I was thinking of inviting Miko-senpai, too...

group_1.textLeft: ...Which happens to be...who, exactly...?

group_1.textRight: A highschooler set on being a doctor!

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:305501:cheek_0][chara:305501:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:305501:motion_0][chara:305501:lipSynch_1]Could I have a moment to think about it?

group_1.textRight: Whoa, that's unexpected.

group_1.textLeft: I thought she'd be the type to turn her down@on the spot!

group_1.textRight: Are we seeing a new side of Sae?

group_1.textLeft: Well, it looks like she's having fun,@so whatevs!
Hey, Rikki! We should have a girls' night out@before the mixer!

group_1.textRight: Great idea! Emirin, you're seriously a genius!

group_1.textLeft: Let's start it now! I'll go call Myako-senpai!

group_1.textRight: Umm... The counseling room can't@hold any more people, right...?

group_1.textLeft: Well, we'll manage somehow!

group_1.textCenter: (...It's not like I'm becoming familiar with them,@right?)
(I'm sure I'll make excellent connections@from here on!)

group_1.textRight: Sae! Could you come over here for a moment?!
